QuestData.Title: Ring of Trials: Crushmaul
QuestData.Description: So you want to fight in the Ring of Trials do you? It's your funeral, bub!$b$bYour first fight is against an exceptionally large and angry ogre named Crushmaul. That's not all though, you'll have to take out his armored boar companion too; Crushmaul never goes into the ring without him!$b$bI hope your affairs are in order, because the last gladiator that fought Crushmaul went home in a body bag...$b$bI'm counting on you! Get your ass inside the arena and speak with my associate Guzrug to start the fight!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Your first match is against Crushmaul!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Crushmaul in the Ring of Trials.
QuestData.CompletionText: What are you waiting for? Get in the ring and start spilling blood!
QuestData.RewardText: Whoa! I couldn't tell if that was Porkchop squealing in there or if you had Crushmaul crying like a little baby!$b$bYou've got talent, kid!$b$bHere's your cut of the profit, but why stop there? Together we can make a mountain of gold!

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Guzrug to begin the fight
